schools.name: Greenville Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Greenville Elementary School, a public school located in Greenville, IL, serves grades PK-5 in the Bond County Community Unit School District 2.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Bond County Community Unit School District 2
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Bond Cty Community Unit 2 High School
schools.school-summary: Bond Cty Community Unit 2 High School, a public school located in Greenville, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Bond County Community Unit School District 2.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Greenville Jr High School
schools.school-summary: Greenville Jr High School, a public school located in Greenville, IL, serves grades 6-8 in the Bond County Community Unit School District 2.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
